overview:
Ben Blanton is a TV news producer at WHNS (FOX Carolina) in Greenville, SC.

Ben has more than four years of experience producing morning, evening, and late-night news. Hired after an internship in 2008, Ben Blanton assumed daily producing duties on the station’s morning newscast within four months of being hired as a part-time writer.

After two years of producing two hours a day of live, local morning television, Ben was promoted to evening producer. He oversaw the only 6:30 PM newscast in the Greenville-Spartanburg-Anderson-Asheville market, offering viewers a local alternative to network news.

In 2012, WHNS management asked Ben Blanton to launch the station’s first 11 PM newscast. He quickly established the show’s position in the market, drawing viewers away from other more traditional and established late-night options.
